data.title: wanderingmark
data.meta_description: 3 posts published by wanderingmark during November 2014
data.text:
I’ve not yet had the opportunity to go to the Pacific islands myself but my fellow data collector, Hugh, was there recently. Below he shares his experiences and impressions of the Republic of Kiribati. Best wishes, Mark. My recent research trip … Continue reading →

Was Charles Dickens writing about Harare when he penned A Tale of Two Cities? Well, no he wasn’t – Harare was founded in 1890, some 30 years after his book was first published, but it’s certainly a fairly apt way … Continue reading →

My colleague, Eleanor, is recently back from Oman. Here she shares her impresssions of the country plus some tips to keep you out of trouble while abroad! Best wishes, Mark. My most recent trip took me to Oman and its … Continue reading →
